class="odocwiki_info"|<<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|make ~?action ~?round~_~5 ~?h~2~4 ~(~)>> produces a clock~-style time picker
    for hours and minutes~. ~The user is first asked to pick hours~, then
    minutes with a separate clock~.


    ~If <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|action>> is provided~, it is called when a new time is
    available~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|init>> ~(if provided~) is the default displayed time~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|update>> is a ~React event that can be used to trigger updates from
    outside~.


    ~If <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|round~_~5>> is true ~(default~: false~)~, the output for the minutes
    is rounded to multiples of ~5~.


    ~If <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|h~2~4>> is true ~(default~: true~)~, a ~2~4~-hour hour picker is
    used~.


    ~The first part of the output is the clock~. ~The second part of the
    output is a reactive signal <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~(h~, m~)>> where <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|h>> are the hours and
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|m>> the minutes that the user picked~. ~The third part of the output
    is a function that can be called to go back to hours selection~.
>>
